#include<stdio.h>
#define gc() getchar()
//#define gc() getchar_unlocked()
inline int fastread()
{
int i=0;
char c=gc();
while(c<48) c=gc();
while(c>47)
{
i=i*10+c-48;
c=gc();
}
return i;
}
int main()
{
	int t,n;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		scanf("%d",&n);	
		if(n>1)
		printf("YES\n");
		else
		printf("NO\n");
	}
	return 0;
}
